title: Seven Samurai 1954 1080p Criterion Bluray 10bit x265 HEVC-UTR
description:
Source: Seven Samurai 1954 1080p CC Bluray x264-GCJM 

 This is the nature of war: by protecting others, you save yourself

 =======

 Shichinin no samurai

 =======

 A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

 =======

 Encoded from the 207 minute Criterion blu-ray release.

 Included Audio Commentaries :

 * Japanese film expert Michael Jeck, which was
 recorded exclusively for Criterion in 1988.

 * Scholars and critics David Desser, Joan Mellen,
 Stephen Prince, Tony Rayns, and Donald Richie
 discussing Seven Samurai, recorded between 2005 and 2006.

 =======

 Audio 2 : [Commentary - Michael Jeck] English

 Subtitles : English, French
